Cards.Lore: To those willing to step into a world of Demonic etiquette and politics, the Court of Ristul is willing to offer considerable power... for a price. — Jolixia

Cards.Lore: The Treants of Roseleaf and the Vhoul have lived together peacefully for generations. But now interlopers have turned our home into a battlefield. We have made the call to our cousins in the Vale of Augery - the Vhoul must be protected...

Cards.Lore: By helping myself I'm helping all of us!

Cards.Lore: "Our god is strange to the Vhoul. I understand. Once She was strange to me. But in time they will learn to love her as we do." — Legion Commander on the re-purposing of a Vhoul place of worship.

Cards.Name: The Cover of Night

Cards.Name: Treant Protector

Abilities.Name: Branches of Iron
Abilities.Text: Treant Protector's allied neighbors have +2 Armor.

Cards.Lore: My feelings on the war in Roseleaf are... complicated. Neither the Bronze Legion nor the Red Mist are threats to my people, and yet my cousins willingly intercede on the Vhoul's behalf. Their fondness for such frail creatures is strange to me.

Cards.Name: Tresdin's Standards

Cards.Lore: I knew this day would come the moment I agreed to host Rix's gatherings in my wine cellar... [...] I know it's only a matter of time before Tresdin has me executed, and I won't lie. I'm scared. But we all have our parts to play. — Papa Samet, Vhoul Martyr
